name: CQ.themes.wcm.Annotation
doc: The theme-specific constants for CQ.wcm.Annotation.This class is a singleton and cannot be create...

props.name: EXIT_SKETCH_DELAY
props.doc:
<static> The delay in milliseconds to exit the sketch tool after a sketch has
been finished.

props.name: MINHEIGHT
props.doc: <static> The min height of the annotation.

props.name: MINWIDTH
props.doc: <static> The min width of the annotation.

props.name: SAVE_DELAY
props.doc:
<static> The delay in milliseconds for save calls after resize, changing the color, 
minimi...

props.name: SKETCHABLE
props.doc: <static> True to enable the sketch tool.

props.name: STROKE_STYLES
props.doc: <static> The stroke colors of the available color schemes.
